name: Third Bridge
description:
Third bridge was an idea I was long planning to execute, experimenting with Unity URP, some shaders, and a lot of work, I could bring this to life.

It is a short game (10 min. max) about a character stranded on this cursed bridge, based on a real bridge (aka Terceira Ponte) located in Espiríto Santo - Brazil.

Thanks for your visit.

Controls:

WASD: Move Around

Mouse: Look Around

Mouse Right Click: Zoom

Ctrl: Crouch

Have Fun!

Edit: Corrected a Bug with the Train Collider and the train sound effect volume!
